seo.title: Somis Studio
seo.description: Somis Studio is a NFT Launchpad for creators and collectors. Create your NFT collection and launch it on the Solana blockchain.

launches.title: Manage Launches
launches.description: Here you can manage all the NFT launches and drops that you have created

create.title: Create your NFT Launchpad
create.description: Please select the type of collection you want to launch
create.fixedCollectionDescription: Create copies of the same NFT. Every NFT will be numbered based on the number of NFTs you have chosen to create.
create.generativeCollectionDescription: Create a generative NFT collection. Recommended for drops with a total file size under 10MB. JSON file supported. An optional JSON file can be included for token metadata.

createFixedCollection.title: Fixed Collection
createFixedCollection.description: The launchpad details will be shown to users when they visit your launchpad page

createGenerativeCollection.title: Generative Collection
createGenerativeCollection.description: Recommended for drops with a total file size under 10MB. JSON file supported. An optional JSON file can be included for token metadata.

description.media: Follow the example file structure to organize your nft & metadata.
description.metadata: Follow the example file structure to organize your nft & metadata.
description.walletList: Upload a CSV file with the wallet addresses. each address should be on a new line. max 100 amount of addresses.

hits.title: Organize your metadata
hits.description: Follow the example file structure to organize your NFT & metadata.

originalCard.title: Launchpad created
originalCard.description: Your launchpad has been created. You can now add your NFTs and metadata.

errors.countMissmatch: The number of NFTs in the collection does not match the number of NFTs in the metadata file. ({{cNfts}} NFTs in the collection, {{mNfts}} NFTs in the metadata file)

metatdata.title: Upload New Metadata
metatdata.description: Recommended for drops with a total file size under 10MB. JSON file supported. An optional JSON file can be included for token metadata.

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: Specify date & time for metadata change
